defaultMessage: The current market price is {marketPrice} while this offer will be sold for {price}
Indicates the amount of time in {minutes} your buyer has to make their payment. The trade will automatically be canceled if the buyer has not clicked {confirmed} before the payment window expires.

Buyers often look for the best value and great vendor ratings. Choose a margin that you think your target buyers will find attractive. Here, you can set your exact offers limits, and advanced options.
Your offer will not be shown to the public unless you comply with the following:
Your wallet account has at least {maximum} available, which is the maximum amount of your offer!
Your wallet account has at least {minimum} available, which is the minimum amount of your offer!
